Class Client

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.it.galaxytrucker.networking.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIClient, SocketClient
public abstract class Client extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Runnable, ClientInterface

  • Field Details

    • model

      protected final ClientModel model
      The client-side representation of the game model. It stores the game state as perceived by this client.

    • view

      protected final View view
      The user interface that this client interacts with. The view is responsible for displaying game information and capturing user input.

    • commandSenderExecutor

      protected final ExecutorService commandSenderExecutor
      An executor service to send user input messages to the server asynchronously. This ensures that the client's main thread is not blocked while sending data.

    • buildingTimerIsActive

      protected boolean buildingTimerIsActive
      A flag indicating whether the building phase timer is currently active.

    • connectedToServer

      protected boolean connectedToServer

    • isBuildingTimerIsActive

      public boolean isBuildingTimerIsActive()
      Description copied from interface: ClientInterface
      Returns whether the building time is active or not.
      Specified by:
      isBuildingTimerIsActive in interface ClientInterface
      Returns:
      true if the timer is active, false otherwise.

    • receiveUserInput

      public abstract void receiveUserInput(UserInput input)
      Description copied from interface: ClientInterface
      Passes a UserInput object to the client to be interpreted and converted into relevant game actions.
      Specified by:
      receiveUserInput in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      input - the UserInput object to be interpreted.

    • processServerUpdate

      public void processServerUpdate(GameUpdate update) throws RemoteException
      Receives a game update message from the server and processes it. The method updates the client's model and view based on the type of update received.
      Parameters:
      update - The GameUpdate object containing information from the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an RMI communication error occurs (though typically handled by the RMI runtime).
